pr_title: Add timeout to hasMessageAvailable to leader election process in Pulsar Functions

timeline.message: Add timeout to hasMessageAvailable to leader election process in Pulsar Functions

timeline.bodyText: It's dangerous to have a timeout here, because we might miss messages. Instead we should rely on the timeout in the GetLastMessageId RPC (which should be already there now)
timeline.author: merlimat

replies.bodyText: When the timeout expires, a TimeoutException will be thrown and which will force the worker to shutdown and restart.  Another worker can more process to becoming leader.
replies.author: jerrypeng
